mapper.select: select * from ( select 10 as taak_type_nr, 'schuldvordering goedkeuren' as taak_b, dos.dossier_nr, dos.dossier_b_l as dossier_b, case when sv.DEELOPDRACHT_ID is null then coalesce(br.auteur_id, dos.DOSS_HDR_ID) else dodos.DOSS_HDR_ID end as uitvoerder, coalesce(br.BRIEF_NR, art46.schuldvordering_nr(vordering_id)) as omschrijving, b.bestek_nr || ': ' || coalesce(b.omschrijving, '') as extra_info, case when sv.AANVR_SCHULDVORDERING_ID is null then 's/bestek/' || sv.BESTEK_Id || '/schuldvorderingen/' || sv.vordering_id else 's/bestek/' || sv.BESTEK_Id || '/aanvraagSchuldvordering/' || sv.aanvr_schuldvordering_id end as link, (sv.UITERSTE_VERIFIC_D - 2 days) as uiterste_eind_d, (days(sv.UITERSTE_VERIFIC_D) - days(current date) - 2 ) as termijn, 1 from ART46.SCHULDVORDERING sv left join ART46.BRIEF br on sv.brief_id = br.brief_id inner join ART46.BESTEK b on sv.bestek_id = b.bestek_id inner join ART46.V_DOSSIER dos on b.dossier_id = dos.id left join art46.DEELOPDRACHT do on sv.DEELOPDRACHT_ID = do.DEELOPDRACHT_ID left join art46.v_DOSSIER dodos on do.DOSSIER_ID = dodos.id where sv.acceptatie_D is null and sv.afgekeurd_jn != 'J' and sv.status != 'IN OPMAAK' ) as t where 1 =1 and uitvoerder = #{doss_hdr_id} order by termijn

with sv_agregate as ( select count(*) as aantal, min(sv.UITERSTE_VERIFIC_D) as uiterste_eind_d from art46.schuldvordering sv left join art46.brief br on sv.brief_id = br.brief_id where sv.status like 'BEOORDEELD' and ( br.dms_id is not null OR sv.AANVR_SCHULDVORDERING_ID is not null) ) select 20 as taak_type_nr, 'ondertekenen schuldvorderingen' as taak_b, cast(null as int) as dossier_id, cast(null as char) as uitvoerder, 'ondertekenen' as omschrijving, sv_agregate.aantal || ' schuldvordering(en) te ondertekenen' as extra_info, 's/tekeurenschuldvorderingen' as link, sv_agregate.uiterste_eind_d, (days(sv_agregate.uiterste_eind_d) - days(current date)) as termijn from sv_agregate where sv_agregate.aantal > 0

with sv_agregate as ( select count(*) as aantal, min(sv.UITERSTE_VERIFIC_D) as uiterste_eind_d from art46.schuldvordering sv inner join art46.brief br on sv.brief_id = br.brief_id where sv.status like 'BEOORDEELD' and br.dms_id is null and sv.AANVR_SCHULDVORDERING_ID is null -- enkel niet digitaal traject ) select 40 as taak_type_nr, 'scannen schuldvorderingen' as taak_b, cast(null as int) as dossier_id, cast(null as char) as uitvoerder, 'scannen' as omschrijving, sv_agregate.aantal || ' schuldvordering(en) te scannen' as extra_info, 's/tescannenschuldvorderingen' as link, sv_agregate.uiterste_eind_d, (days(sv_agregate.uiterste_eind_d) - days(current date)) as termijn from sv_agregate where sv_agregate.aantal > 0

with sv_agregate as ( select count(*) as aantal, min(sv.UITERSTE_VERIFIC_D) as uiterste_eind_d from art46.schuldvordering sv inner join art46.brief br on sv.brief_id = br.brief_id where sv.status like 'ONDERTEKEND' and br.dms_id is not null and sv.AANVR_SCHULDVORDERING_ID is null -- enkel niet digitaal traject ) select 50 as taak_type_nr, 'printen schuldvorderingen' as taak_b, cast(null as int) as dossier_id, cast(null as char) as uitvoerder, 'printen' as omschrijving, sv_agregate.aantal || ' schuldvordering(en) te printen' as extra_info, 's/teprintenschuldvorderingen' as link, sv_agregate.uiterste_eind_d, (days(sv_agregate.uiterste_eind_d) - days(current date)) as termijn from sv_agregate where sv_agregate.aantal > 0

select 60 as taak_type_nr, 'voorstel beoordelen' as taak_b, dos.dossier_nr, dos.dossier_b_l as dossier_b, dos.DOSS_HDR_ID as uitvoerder, art46.VOORSTEL_DEELOPDRACHT_NR(vd.id) || ', inzender : ' || of.INZENDER as omschrijving, b.bestek_nr || ': ' || coalesce(b.omschrijving, '') as extra_info, 's/bestek/' || of.BESTEK_Id || '/voorstel/' || vd.ID as link, (date(vd.AANVRAAG_DATUM) + 30 days) as uiterste_eind_d, (days(date(vd.AANVRAAG_DATUM)) + 30 - days(current date)) as termijn from art46.VOORSTEL_DEELOPDRACHT vd left join art46.v_dossier dos on vd.DOSSIER_ID = dos.id left join art46.OFFERTE of on vd.OFFERTE_ID = of.ID left join art46.BESTEK b on of.BESTEK_ID = b.BESTEK_ID WHERE 1 = 1 and vd.status = 'BEOORDELEN' and dos.DOSS_HDR_ID = #{doss_hdr_id}

select 100 as taak_type_nr, 'deelopdracht goedkeuren' as taak_b, do.ander_dossier_nr as dossier_nr, do.ander_dossier_b as dossier_b, do.ander_doss_hdr_id as uitvoerder, do.deelopdracht_nr as omschrijving, do.dossier_nr || ' : ' || do.dossier_b_l as extra_info, 's/bestek/' || do.bestek_id || '/deelopdrachten/' || do.deelopdracht_id as link, cast(null as date) as uiterste_eind_d, cast(null as int) as termijn from art46.v_deelopdracht do where 1 = 1 and do.afsluit_d is null and do.goedkeuring_d is null and do.ander_raamcontract_jn = 'J' and do.ander_doss_hdr_id = #{doss_hdr_id}

select 80 as taak_type_nr, 'brief_in_check_afd_hfd' as taak_type, br.brief_id as taak_key, 'inkomende brief' as taak_b, 'green' as kleur, dos.dossier_nr, dos.dossier_b_l as dossier_b, cast(null as char) as uitvoerder, br.brief_nr as omschrijving, br.dms_folder || '/' || br.dms_filename as dms_file, bra.brief_aard_b || ' , TODOOOO' as extra_info, 'briefdetails.do?brief_id=' || br.brief_id as link, 'J' as afwerk_jn, (date(coalesce(br.in_d, br.inschrijf_d)) + 30 days) as uiterste_eind_d, (days(date(coalesce(br.in_d, br.inschrijf_d))) + bra.TERMIJN - days(current date)) as termijn from art46.brief br left join art46.v_dossier dos on br.DOSSIER_ID = dos.id inner join art46.brief_aard bra on br.IN_AARD_ID = bra.BRIEF_AARD_ID left join art46.schuldvordering sv on br.brief_id = sv.brief_id WHERE 1 = 1 and br.QR_CODE is not null and br.check_afd_hfd_d is null and bra.termijn is not null and sv.vordering_id is null and bra.CONTROLE_AFDELINGSHOOFD_JN = 'J' fetch first 200 rows only

select 90 as taak_type_nr, 'brief_in_check_auteur' as taak_type, br.brief_id as taak_key, 'inkomende brief' as taak_b, case when br.opmerking_afd_hfd is null then null else 'red' end as kleur, dos.dossier_nr, dos.dossier_b_l as dossier_b, cast(null as char) as uitvoerder, br.brief_nr as omschrijving, br.dms_folder || '/' || br.dms_filename as dms_file, bra.brief_aard_b || ' , ' || coalesce(br.betreft, '') as extra_info, case when br.opmerking_afd_hfd is null then '' else br.opmerking_afd_hfd end as extra_info_2, 'briefdetails.do?brief_id=' || br.brief_id as link, 'J' as afwerk_jn, (date(coalesce(br.in_d, br.inschrijf_d)) + 30 days) as uiterste_eind_d, (days(date(coalesce(br.in_d, br.inschrijf_d))) + bra.TERMIJN - days(current date)) as termijn from art46.brief br left join art46.v_dossier dos on br.DOSSIER_ID = dos.id inner join art46.brief_aard bra on br.IN_AARD_ID = bra.BRIEF_AARD_ID left join art46.schuldvordering sv on br.brief_id = sv.brief_id WHERE 1 = 1 and br.QR_CODE is not null and br.check_auteur_d is null and bra.termijn is not null and sv.vordering_id is null and (bra.CONTROLE_AFDELINGSHOOFD_JN = 'N' or (bra.CONTROLE_AFDELINGSHOOFD_JN = 'J' and br.CHECK_AFD_HFD_D is not null)) and (br.auteur_id = #{doss_hdr_id} or (br.auteur_id is null and dos.DOSS_HDR_ID = #{doss_hdr_id}) ) fetch first 200 rows only

with agregate as ( select count(*) as aantal from art46.brief br left join art46.schuldvordering sv on sv.brief_id = br.brief_id where 1 = 1 and sv.vordering_id is null and br.teprinten_jn = 'J' and br.uit_aard_id is not null and br.uit_aard_id != 0 and br.dms_id is not null ) select 51 as taak_type_nr, 'printen brieven' as taak_b, cast(null as int) as dossier_id, cast(null as char) as uitvoerder, 'printen' as omschrijving, agregate.aantal || ' brieven te printen' as extra_info, 's/taken/brief/printen' as link from agregate where agregate.aantal > 0

select tat.taak_type_volgnr, tat.taak_type, tat.taak_b, dt.taak_id as taak_key, dos.dossier_nr, dos.dossier_b_l as dossier_b, dos.doss_hdr_id as uitvoerder, dos.dossier_b_l as omschrijving, 's/dossier/' || dos.id as link, 'J' as afwerk_jn from art46.dossier_taak dt inner join art46.v_dossier dos on dt.DOSSIER_ID = dos.id inner join art46.taak_type tat on dt.taak_type = tat.taak_type WHERE 1 = 1 and dt.taak_type = 'nieuw PAD dossier' and dos.DOSS_HDR_ID = #{doss_hdr_id} and dt.behandeld_d is null fetch first 200 rows only
